thread.title: BDGA Match Play pairings set
thread.title_full: BDGA Match Play pairings set - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: BDGA Match Play pairings set
text:
Billy Hanes will face Bob Rosen in one semifinal and PJ Alterio will meet Andy Fretthold in the other Sunday in the Buffalo District Golf Association Match Play championship at the Orchard Park Country Club. The winners will meet in the final Sunday afternoon.
Hanes defeated Brent Gadacz, 4 and 3 and Rosen outlasted Jake Katz, 1 up in 21 holes to advance in one quarterfinal bracket on Saturday. Fretthold downed Jim Pandolfe Jr., 3 and 1, and Alterio topped Alex Misiti, 4-3, in the other.
Woody Arnold will face Steve Stone in the Senior Division final on Sunday. Arnold defated Joe Gugino, 1-up one semifinal on Saturday. Stone downed Randy Kramer, 6 and 5, in the other.
